name: The Compliment Corner
description:
This casual puzzle game was created in estimated 3 days (real time) for the GamePlusJam 2021. The loading bar might not progress when you first run the game, but the game will load and play. Thank you!

Give out the best compliment to get the best score (and tips)! Use your trusty notepad to find a compliment for your customers before your shift ends, the better the compliment, the happier your customers will be!

How to Play:

  1. Study the features of your customers.
  2. Open up your notepad to look at the compliments.
  3. Pick out a compliment that you think best suites the customer.
  4. Close the notepad and click on the customer to give the compliment.
  5. If the compliment is good, the customer will give you tips and earn you points!
  6. Be careful, the customer will be angry if you give the wrong compliment!
  7. Try to give compliments to all your customers before your shift ends!

Credits:

  • Brendan Reilly / Game Design, Scripting
  • Shawn Liu / Game Design, Artist
  • Music Source: Coffee Morning by Olga Scotland on FMA: https://freemusicarchive.org/home
  • Created in Unity

Note:

  • Resolution: 1920x1080
  • Included a PC build to download and play on your computer.
